name: Balsamic Brussels Sprouts with Feta Cheese and Walnuts
author: Raechel Valerius
summary: Easy yummy way to enjoy Brussels sprouts.
ingredients: 1 pound Brussels sprouts, trimmed and halved
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Preheat oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C)
Combine Brussels sprouts, red onion, and garlic in a large bowl
Drizzle balsamic vinegar, olive oil, and maple syrup over the sprouts mixture and toss to coat
Season vegetables with salt and pepper; pour onto a baking sheet
Roast vegetable mixture in preheated oven until the sprouts are tender and the sauce thickened, about 40 minutes
Transfer vegetables and sauce to a large serving bowl; add walnuts, cranberries, and feta cheese and stir to mix
